name: Currency Trader
description:
Farm currency to become rich!

A very cool game.

Having trouble with logging and registering?

Here are a few things that may help you:

1.Register, restart, then login

2.Enter the login menu, and type "guestmode" to enter guest mode

3.Create a file with the extension .user, then call it the nickname you want. Open it with notepad, then type the passkey, and login into Currency Trader.
